title: Hex Color Idle
description: Hex Color Idle is a unique idle game in which you must work to develop a range of hexadecimal colors. With over 16,000 different colors to make this game has endless possibilities and will keep you entertained for hours. You must use the 5 paint squares to create a mix of different colors â€“ depending on the mix you have, this will affect your chances of creating a new color.
